text: Happy Feet Two is a 2011 Australian-American 3D computer-animated family musical movie directed by George Miller. It is a sequel to Miller's 2006 movie Happy Feet. It stars Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Hugo Weaving, Magda Szubanski and Anthony LaPaglia reprising their roles from the first movie. Brad Pitt also stars in the movie. ==References== Category:2011 animated movies Category:2011 musical movies Category:2010s computer-animated movies Category:American animated movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies about penguins Category:Movies set in Antarctica Category:Australian family movies Category:Australian musical movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by George Miller Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2010s 3D movies Category:Australian comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American family comedy movies Category:2010s family movies
title: Happy Feet Two
